- [ ] 📝 Documentation update
- [ ] ♻️ Code refactoring
- [ ] ⚡ Performance improvement
- [ ] ✅ Test addition/update
- [ ] 🔧 Configuration change
- [ ] 🚀 CI/CD change

## ✅ Checklist

### General

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have read and followed the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guide

### Git & Commits

- [ ] My commits follow the [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) specification
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the base branch (`master`)
- [ ] I have resolved any merge conflicts

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this on multiple devices/browsers (if applicable)
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Backend (if applicable)

- [ ] Go fmt has been run
- [ ] golangci-lint passes without errors
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if schema changed)
- [ ] API documentation is updated (if endpoints changed)
- [ ] Error handling is comprehensive

### Frontend (if applicable)

- [ ] ESLint passes without errors
- [ ] Prettier formatting is applied
- [ ] Components are responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- [ ] Accessibility (a11y) standards are met
- [ ] No console errors or warnings

### Documentation

- [ ] README.md is updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation is updated (if needed)
- [ ] Code comments are added for complex logic
- [ ] Inline documentation (JSDoc/GoDoc) is complete

## 👀 Reviewer Checklist

<!-- For reviewers to complete -->

- [ ] Code quality is acceptable
- [ ] Tests are comprehensive
- [ ] Documentation is complete
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Performance impact is acceptable
- [ ] Changes align with project architecture

## 🎉 Post-Merge

<!-- To be completed after merge -->

- [ ] Branch deleted
- [ ] Related issues closed
- [ ] Changelog updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Deployment completed (if applicable)
